Reference

All functions

activation_rate()

Calculate the next-time ACT activation rate

alias2SymbolUsingNCBI()

Convert Gene Aliases to Official Gene Symbols

assert_dgCMatrix()

Check if the sparse matrix valid

disease_ids

Disease MeSH identifiers

disease_impact_score()

Get disease impact score

drug_annot

Drug annotation dataset

gene_disease

Gene-disease associations

get_neighbors()

Get neighboring nodes in a graph (adjacency matrix)

gradient()

Compute gradient of Spreadgram

graph

A small example implemented from Anderson (1983)

is.dgCMatrix()

Check if a matrix is `dgCMatrix` class

labyrinth-package labyrinth

Labyrinth: A Simulation of Knowledge Networks

load_data()

Load External Data

mesh_annot

MeSH annotation data

mesh_hierarchy

MeSH hierarchy network

mesh_synonyms

MeSH synonyms

model

Pre-trained model of labyrinth

ncbi_info

NCBI Gene Information

ppi

Protein-protein interaction network

predict_drug()

Predict drug response scores based on disease weights

random_walk()

Graph diffusion using a Markov random walk

sigmoid()

Sigmoid function of Spreadgram

speech

A portion of the phonological network examined in Vitevitch (2008).

spread_gram()

Simulate spreading activation in a network (Main function)

spread_gram_1()

Simulate spreading activation in a network (Only once)

transfer_activation()

Calculate the received activation in Spreading Activation (f)

update_gene_symbol()

Update gene symbol using NCBI Entrez Gene
